item.title: Registration is now open for the Bare Your Sole walkathon
item.description: Source: Habitat for Humanity. Habitat for Humanity Singapore’s yearly walkathon, Bare Your Sole, is back for its seventh year on May 30th. This event unites individuals from all backgrounds to highlight the challenges faced by those living in poverty who lack access to basic necessities like shelter and shoes. The funds gathered from the 2km and 4km barefoot walkathon will support Habitat for Humanity Singapore’s Project HomeWorks program. This local initiative focuses on enhancing the living situations of seniors, individuals with illnesses, and those with physical disabilities residing in one-room apartments in Singapore.
